oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Daniel Hoge Bruce from his cousin, Sue
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Daniel Hoge Bruce, Co. A, 51st Va. Inf., Regt., CSA, from his cousin, Sue. She writes, "I suppose you have been engaged in a fight since you wrote. We have heard but very little of the result. Indeed, I hardly know how to write, whether I am penning my lines to the 'living or dead.'"
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
